title: FC official shot at, injured in Islamabad - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
ISLAMABAD: An official of the FC was injured by shooting from an unknown person.

According to police sources, the FC official was sitting outside his house in Chatha Bakhtawar, within the limits of the Shahzad Town Police Station.

“Some unknown person opened fire at official and managed to flee from there. As bullet had touched the head so official was discharged from hospital after treatment,” they said.

“We asked him time and again but official says he has no enmity with any person. However, an investigation is going on,” they said.

Published in Dawn, June 1st, 2025
